mapper.select: SELECT DATE(#{startDate}) AS statisticDate , p.platform_id AS platformId , IFNULL(fm.amount,0) AS amount , IFNULL(fm.expense,0) AS expense , IFNULL(l.uvCnt,0) AS uvCnt , IFNULL(l.clickCnt,0) AS clickCnt , CASE WHEN p.price_mode = 1 THEN p.cpa_price ELSE p.uv_price END AS price FROM mgt_loan_platforms p LEFT JOIN( SELECT log.cookie_id AS platform_id , COUNT(DISTINCT log.user_id) AS uvCnt , COUNT(log.user_id) AS clickCnt FROM mgt_user_event_logs log WHERE log.creation_date >= #{startDate} AND log.creation_date < #{endDate} AND log.event_name IN('daichao' , 'jbb2' , 'bnh' , 'xhyp') AND log.cookie_id != '' AND log.cookie_id != 'undefined' GROUP BY log.cookie_id ) l ON p.platform_id = l.platform_id LEFT JOIN mgt_loan_platform_statistic fm ON fm.statistic_date = DATE(#{startDate}) AND fm.platform_id = l.platform_id order by p.platform_id desc

select p1.platform_id AS platformId,arr.click_cnt as clickCnt,arr.uv_cnt as uvCnt from mgt_loan_platforms p1 LEFT JOIN (select p.platform_id , count(e.cookie_id) as click_cnt ,COUNT(DISTINCT(e.user_id)) as uv_cnt from mgt_loan_platforms p LEFT JOIN mgt_user_event_logs e ON ltrim(p.platform_id) = e.cookie_id WHERE e.event_name in ('daichao','jbb2','bnh','xhyp') AND cookie_id!='' AND e.creation_date >= #{startDate} AND e.creation_date < #{endDate} GROUP BY p.platform_id ORDER BY p.platform_id ) arr ON p1.platform_id = arr.platform_id
AND p1.platform_id = #{platformId}
